title: S1 Ep60: The Glittering Ghosts of Las Vegas - Hr.2
itunes:title: The Glittering Ghosts of Las Vegas - Hr.2
description: In Hour two, Darkness Radio welcomes Janice Oberding in to talk about the Las Vegas Paranormal Conference and the haunted history of Las Vegas. Then , Donna LaCroix of Ghost Hunters joins the show to talk about a new project.
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
